Looking for up-to-date Watir technical documentation?

Written by: bpettichord on October 14, 2010

Up-to-date technical documentation about the Watir library is accessible on rdoc.info, in the user-friendly yard format. The Watir documentation page also includes a link to this. Every time a new version of Watir is released, this site will be updated automatically.
